### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #20892 (tests: Run both descriptor and legacy tests within a single test invocation by achow101)
* #17211 (Allow fundrawt
Rebased for CI fix on master.
Thank you @fjahr, updated with your feedback: `git diff 9c7b474 847288d`
Code review ACK 9c7b474cfd71cc5311db4e98c0efd1736a1096fb\n\nThe only change was the removal of two now redundant/duplicate tests.
```suggestion\n        // Pass a mantissa of 3 as sat/vB fee rates cannot represent values having more than 3 significant digits.\n```
in 91b2524c15810d6867d46f1aee6f172612a21fc7:\n\nI think this one can be removed now since it is included below?
in 91b2524:\n\nCan also be removed I think.
There should be no difference in python between `0.`, and `.0`, or any other combination that appends zeros to any side of either of them.
In C++ all functions are `extern`, so this can be removed without any downside
